>
> no they are not, they troll whole game, buy tear all game and when game finishing just sell everything and just buy 1 item to look they are playing, while other guy just sitting AFK and saying he is playing other game bcoz cant b bother in just 3min of game?

Yeah those guys suck. I don't know if they can be banned for that but if you report them I know for sure they will get placed in low priority queue.

AceAkali, I've seen many of your posts and they all read as follows:
"Fuck this guy, fuck that guy, fuck these things, fuck everything".
If you take that attitude into the game, people will act accordingly.
Perhaps if you adjust your own attitude, you may see a positive response in the games you play.

Instead of being negative all the time, make positive suggestions. Such as, "you're getting rekt in lane, perhaps you should tank up a bit instead of building full damage?", etc. Don't just bitch "you're a noob, uninstall you retard".

Often, people who claim that assholes are everywhere, are themselves the asshole, causing the problem.

Maybe you are in Bronze 5 (just a guess, based on your attitude) for a reason, because you are offensive and put your own team on tilt. Perhaps if you start being helpful and encouraging, you can grind your way up to a level where players don't troll so much.

If this is too much to ask, perhaps team games aren't for you, there are plenty of solo games available elsewhere.
